feed.title: Your First 100 Miler
feed.subtitle: Everything you need to knkow to run your first 100 miler.

entry.title: Pikes Peak Winter Ascent
entry.summary: I ascended Pikes Peak in the winter. It was my first 14. It was one of the stoutest things I've done since Bigfoot 200.
entry.content:
I ascended Pikes Peak in the winter. It was my first 14. It was one of the stoutest things I've done since Bigfoot 200.

My friend Jeremy met me at my house at 4:30 and we drove to the Barr Trail trailhead in Manitou Springs. We got there, got our packs and equipment ready, and were on the trail by about 5:10 or so. We initially thought we might go a ways without spikes, but there was a lot of ice at the very bottom of the trail, so we quickly decided to put on our microspikes.
